article.name: Eightball
article.description:
I found a very cool 3D modelling plugin by recommendation called Cult3D. www.cult3d.com. Anyhow, I had to test it out, so I created a simple eightball model based on, made up a basic texture to wrap around it... and hey presto, exported it to cult3d designer, and exported as an interactive 3D model.
All good fun. Have a play.
article.keywords: eight, ball, eight ball, markavian, texture, cult3d, plugin, 3ds, max, 3d studio, paint shop pro, black, 8, blue
